FFT powers

Source: R/fft_base.R
fft_powers.Rd

Fast Fourier Transform (FFT): powers

Usage

fft_powers(f)

Arguments

f

num. The Fourier coefficients.

Value

\(P\) array of powers, \(P[n] = |c_{n}|\) for \(n=1,\ldots,\ell-1\).

Details

The power of the \(n\)-th harmonics is $$|c_{n}| = \sqrt{a_{n}^{2}+b_{n}^{2}}\,,$$ its frequency is \(n/T\) and period \(T/n\), for \(n=1,\ldots,\ell-1\).

Examples


fft_rfft(hobo$t_hobo[1:(24 * 5)]) %>%
  fft_powers()
#>  [1] 1.16716029 0.30612045 0.92755676 0.54660798 0.90190659 1.14760911
#>  [7] 0.19939420 0.36922828 0.87104041 0.68032702 0.33522323 0.72396623
#> [13] 0.93467746 0.12525931 0.43336350 0.62786605 0.51744121 0.45776235
#> [19] 0.29518877 0.58993183 0.26572028 0.05138979 0.08137642 0.21899446
#> [25] 0.26901334 0.59078941 0.20875584 0.55745297 0.21602962 0.41642169
#> [31] 0.57598875 0.26173095 0.57504197 0.18957787 0.17583105 0.42672143
#> [37] 0.20189863 0.25985936 0.40127001 0.55911891 0.39123348 0.26998734
#> [43] 0.07202322 0.37542952 0.08140420 0.25130147 0.47635752 0.14576208
#> [49] 0.28729927 0.27935300 0.39181685 0.07951858 0.36898704 0.52665857
#> [55] 0.39711454 0.34806037 0.28716578 0.61162805 0.23573392 0.55475000
